## Pressure Ulcers (PUs)

::: {.columns}

::: {.column width="60%"}
**Pressure ulcers:** **localised** injuries to the skin and underlying soft tissue that form during **prolonged exposure** to mechanical loads.

![](images/Pressure-Ulcer-Diagram.jpg){width=90%}
:::

::: {.column width="40%"}
::: {.custom-block} 
  
* Stage 1 and stage 2 account for **70%** of PUs **{.fragment}**
* **20%** of hospitalised patients **{.fragment}**
* **34%** of amputees experienced a skin lesion **{.fragment}**
